title: Paul McCartney | Colbert Classic
description:
We're throwing it back to when Sir Paul McCartney took over The Late Show in 2019 with this epic four-part interview to promote his children's book, "Hey Grandude." Listen as Stephen divulges his personal connection to McCartney's music in a conversation about legacy, grief, and a little old band called The Beatles. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
